news.title: Beat The Lotto director Ross Whittaker: "And then the lottery arrived – and the message was, maybe you wouldn’t need a job at all. It was tremendously exciting"
news.summary: Director Ross Whitaker on his new documentary Beat The Lotto, which  tells the extraordinary story of a ‘90s Irish syndicate who attempted to fix the draw.

news.title: CELSIUS Fitness Event at DCU (Photos)
news.summary: Crowds of runners descended upon Dublin City University for the CELSIUS Vibe Run Club, featuring Irish olympic athlete Rhasidat Adeleke

news.title: Jack Moore, son of Thin Lizzy guitarist Gary Moore, releases his first solo song 'The Other Side'
news.summary: The new single is out now and can be heard below.

news.title: Three Irish cyclists to make historic Tour de France Femmes debut
news.summary: The Tour de France Femmes will begin this Saturday, July 26.

news.title: Dublin county hurlers visit GAA Palestine at summer camp in Jordan
news.summary: "As Dublin players, we are proud to stand in solidarity with GAA Palestine," said Dublin forward Fergal Whitely.

news.title: Junior Brother releases new single 'A Lot of Love'
news.summary: Check out the new single and video below.

news.title: April releases new EP An Axe To Grind
news.summary: The record is out now via FADER Label.

news.title: Netflix announces return of Wednesday for third season
news.summary: The upcoming second season was filmed in counties Wicklow, Dublin, and Offaly

news.title: Minding Creative Minds to hold July meet and greet
news.summary: From workshops to meet-and-greets, Minding Creative Minds offers the Irish creative sector an outlet for promoting wellbeing and career advice.

news.title: The Grand Social revamp second venue The Ballroom
news.summary: The downstairs space of The Grand Social has been relaunched as The Ballroom, a 170-cap venue
